en.about_text: Local from Lanzarote, my family says that I'm intelligent, so I learnt to read and the table of two with five years. I'm a science and technology boy, although my curiosity have led me to read some personal development books. I like surfing, I listen and research music in different languages, hence I studied Telecommunications Engineering degree, where I fell in love with programming. Actually I'm training myself in web development, field where I look for a job opportunity.
